backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing products, categories, orders, and user profiles with admin/user authorization checks and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a homepage hero image update to affected frontend file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend files across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, admin-guarded pages, global layout, theming, and providers.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context managing cart state with localStorage persistence and item/quantity operations.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when admin access is denied, with login prompt and optional error message.
Wrapper component restricting access to admin-only routes using identity and admin-check logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state, errors, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to enter a name and saves the profile via API mutation.
frontend/src/components/brand/PremiumTag: Displays a small premium dining tagline text.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/nav/Header.tsx: Renders the main site header with navigation, branding, admin link, cart button, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/products/Categor: Shows category buttons allowing users to filter products by category.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays product details, image, price, availability, and supports navigation and adding to cart.
frontend/src/components/states/ErrorStat: Shows an error alert with optional retry action.
frontend/src/components/states/LoadingSk: Provides skeleton loaders for product cards, grids, and tables.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, categories, orders, and user profile data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles, custom CSS variables for theming, and global typography rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin page for listing, creating, editing, and deleting categories using dialogs, form handling, and server mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with product, category, and order stats plus quick-action links. Fetches counts using query hooks and displays them in cards.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Displays detailed information for a single order, including items and customer data, with loading and error states. Allows navigating back to the orders list.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Shows a table of all orders with loading and error handling. Supports navigation to individual order detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Manages product CRUD operations with dialogs for creation and editing, category selection, and product seeding. Displays products in a table with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, removal options, and total pricing; handles empty-cart and navigation states.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Fetches and filters product catalog by category, shows loading or error states, and lets users add products to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Processes checkout by validating user input, creating an order, clearing the cart, and showing confirmation or errors.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides a marketing-focused landing page with a hero section and feature highlights, linking users to the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Loads and displays product details with add-to-cart functionality, handling loading, error, and out‑of‑stock states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash and query-string routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings, and enabling additional plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s schema, overall system description, and a list of implemented features covering backend canister APIs, RBAC, admin bootstrap, and CRUD operations for products and categories. Serves as a structured registry of feature IDs, descriptions, and versions.
